title: S13 Ep71: The Ghosts of The White House
itunes:title: The Ghosts of The White House
description:
It's a Freaky Friday on BEYOND the DARKNESS and we are off to visit, The Ghosts of The White House with Jeff Belanger.

The White House, from the outside, it looks innocent enough. But step through its front gate and you may be surprised by what you find! From ghostly sightings of Abigail Adams to strange doings in the Lincoln Bedroom, Stories from the past all the way through the Obama administration.

PLUS a Powerful New Theater of the Mind!

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Follow Jeff here: www.JeffBelanger.com

Listen to New England Legends here: http://ournewenglandlegends.com/category/podcasts/
